Date: Friday, 1/31/1985
Subject: Trade offer
Dear Sir,
I would like to offer you following trade:
2B Foster Williams
in return for
1B John Dugas, C Israel Swindle, MR Hobert Evans.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
Pontiac GM

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Progress of Joseph Clyde
Dear Sir,
Joseph Clyde has an ERA of 1.85 at A Longmont Storm!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Progress of Alva Fernandez
Dear Sir,
Alva Fernandez is doing pretty good at A Longmont Storm!
He has an ERA of 3.34, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Progress of Alex Lorenzo
Dear Sir,
Alex Lorenzo has nothing more to prove at A Longmont Storm!
He has an AVG of .396 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Status of Max Andujar
Dear Sir,
Max Andujar shouldn't play at AA St. Paul Saint!
He has an AVG of .237 over there, that might
be a sign that he has been promoted to soon. You
should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director
